official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act for the purpose of mandating guidelines with respect to the return of unused home dialysis supplies.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide guidelines relating to the return of unused home dialysis supplies to the supplier or provider of such supplies.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act for the purpose of mandating guidelines with respect to the return of unused home dialysis supplies.
